description: This file implements the TelemetryMetricsImplementation class, which handles the collection, merging, and publishing of telemetry metrics using JSON data structures. The class provides methods to record metrics, generate unique record IDs, and publish filtered telemetry data to an event bus.

classes.name: TelemetryMetricsImplementation
classes.description: A class that manages telemetry metrics collection, merging, and publishing. It maintains internal data structures for metrics records and filters, and provides thread-safe methods for recording and publishing metrics.

methods.name: TelemetryMetricsImplementation()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the telemetry metrics system and logs creation.

methods.name: ~TelemetryMetricsImplementation()
methods.description: Destructor that uninitializes the telemetry system and logs deletion.

methods.name: std::string generateRecordId(const std::string & id,const std::string & name)
methods.description: Generates a unique record ID by concatenating the provided id and markerName.

methods.name: Core::hresult Record(const std::string & id,const std::string & metrics,const std::string & markerName)
methods.description: Parses a JSON string of metrics, and merges it into an internal record associated with a generated record ID.

methods.name: Core::hresult Publish(const std::string & id,const std::string & markerName)
methods.description: Filters, merges, and publishes telemetry metrics corresponding to a specific record ID and marker name, then cleans up the internal records.

ctags.name: Record
ctags.signature: (const std::string & id,const std::string & metrics,const std::string & markerName)

ctags.name: generateRecordId
ctags.pattern: /^    std::string generateRecordId(const std::string& id, const std::string& name)$/
